title: Client Bug or Glitch, got no idea whats going on.

replies.body: Nothing was done on our end! Sounds like you were most likely just having some random internet issues, which isn't exactly uncommon.

Wasn`t internet connection if that's what you mean. I could browse the internet fine, maybe connection with Riot servers or something. I dunno. Glad everything seems okay for now. 

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Just because you can still access stuff like youtube or netflix doesn't mean you will have a clear connection to game servers. Each server is independent and it's relatively common to have different pings depending on who you're contacting. Next time this happens, feel free to do some basic troubleshooting on the network, or simply wait it out until your ISP straightens things out ^-^!
Okay! Thanks for the info and taking the time to explain things to me. Means a lot :D
